alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 02 at 10:43PM CST until January 03 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Alabama, Mobile Central, Baldwin Central, Mobile Coastal and Baldwin Coastal Counties. In Florida, Escambia Coastal, Santa Rosa Coastal and Okaloosa Coastal Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog is expected to develop near the coast tonight and gradually spread into coastal Alabama and northwest Florida through Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal
